name: HappyHalloween
0:
”Alexa, start Happy Halloween”
”Alexa, ask Happy Halloween to say a greeting”
”Alexa, happy halloween”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy halloween
des:
This Halloween have this skill say scary fun greeting to the trick or treaters. When the doorbell rings, be ready with candy, keep Alexa by the door - and have her say out a new greeting every time. The skill has lots of Halloween messages with different sounds and voices, so be ready to be surprised each time you ask for a new greeting. Once invoked, say 'next' to go to a new greeting each time.
Have a wonderful, fun Halloween with your family, friends and neighbors - especially the little ones!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
